DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Two Oral Formulations MGCD265 Administered Healthy Subjects Fasting State
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study compare rate extent absorption two MGCD265 oral formulation dose level 100 mg administer healthy male female subject fast condition .
